```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(readr)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```
# Importing the data from csv file
```{r}
data <- read.csv("bikeshare_data.csv")
# finding all unique bikeshare stations and a corresponding latitude and longitude for each station
stations <- data %>% select(start_station_name, start_lat, start_lng) %>% distinct(start_station_name, .keep_all=TRUE)
```

Importing sf file as sf object
```{r}
neighborhoods <- sf::read_sf("dc_map_data")
```

```{r}
ggplot(neighborhoods)+geom_sf()
```

```{r}

map_dc <- tm_shape(neighborhoods)
```
